CustomField.description: System field which shows the top-level Parent Task (parent task's parent's parent etc.) for the current Task. Top-level Tasks have no Parent Task or Top-level Parent Task themselves.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: System field which shows the top-level Parent Task (parent task's parent's parent etc.) for the current Task. Top-level Tasks have no Parent Task or Top-level Parent Task themselves.
CustomField.label: Top-level Parent Task
